title: Quiz 5 - Puzzles
instruction:
Directions (Q. 21 – 25): Study the following information carefully and answer the questions given below:

Twelve friends, A, B, C, D, E, F, G, H, I, J, K and L, who are being successful in their respective professions, decided to have a get-together after a long time. They all decided to meet in Delhi for their reunion. Since they all were coming from different places, they decided to reach their nearest airports at three different locations – Mumbai, Bangalore and Kolkata – from where they would be reaching Delhi. Exactly four of them were reaching the same airport. Four of the twelve are Doctors, four are Engineers and four are Pilots. It is also known that:

A is not a Doctor and will not arrive at Mumbai airport. B is an Engineer and F is a Pilot. Either C or G will arrive where F will be reaching. K is an Engineer who will be meeting D. The place is not Kolkata. H is a Doctor who will reach Mumbai airport. J is an Engineer and I is a Doctor and both of them will reach Kolkata. L is a Pilot and both L and F will arrive at Bangalore. G will reach Mumbai and C will reach Bangalore. The number of engineers who arrive at Mumbai airport is two. B will reach Bangalore. G is not a Doctor but has the same profession as F. The number of Doctors who arrive at Kolkata is two but that person is not D.

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are not true?
options: Praveen lives on the topmost floor.
Rohit does not like NDTV and lives on floor number 5.
The one who likes ABP lives exactly between Praveen and Gautam.
Sumit likes Republic TV and lives on floor number 2.
All are true.

quiz.text: How many persons live between the one who likes India TV and Rohit?
options: None
Four
Two
Three
More than four

quiz.text: If Praveen is related to Aaj Tak, Rahul is related to India TV, following the same pattern Gautam is related to which of the following?
options: Zee News
DD News
Times Now
NDTV
Aaj Tak

quiz.text: Four of the following five are alike in a certain way and hence form a group. Which is the one that does not belong to that group?
options: Praveen – Republic TV
Gautam – NDTV
Rohit – News 24
Sachin – India TV
Vishal – DD News

quiz.text: Which of the following combinations is true?
options: Pratik – Floor no 8 – Zee News
Vishal – Floor no 6 – Aaj Tak
Sumit – Floor no 2 – India TV
Gautam – Floor no 7 – NDTV
Vishal – Floor no 6 – DD News

quiz.text: Which of the following companies conducts the interview on 17th June?
options: A
J
G
F
E

quiz.text: How many candidates appeared for the interview conducted on 5th July?
options: 63
67
53
77
58

quiz.text: How many interviews were conducted between E and I?
options: Four
Two
Three
One
Five

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is true?
options: Only one interview is conducted between H and B.
J conducts the interview on 5th November.
The difference between the number of candidates who appeared for the interview on 5th December and on 17th November is 4.
The number of candidates who appeared for the interview in November is 120.
None is true.

quiz.text: Who conducted the interview in which 59 candidates appeared?
options: B
D
H
F
C

quiz.text: Four of the following five are alike in a certain way based on the given arrangement and hence from a group. Which of the following does not belong to the group?
options: K – English
Wednesday – K
Mathematics – Wednesday
Sociology – Statistics
Friday – L

quiz.text: How many people have their interviews between L and M?
options: Two
Three
None
One
More than three

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is TRUE as per the given arrangement?
options: None of the given statements is true
Only one person has an interview between K and J.
O likes Psychology.
M has an interview on Friday.
The one who likes Zoology has an interview on one of the day before M.

quiz.text: Who has an interview immediately after K?
options: M
The one who likes Zoology.
The one who likes Statistics.
J
P

quiz.text: How many people have their interview before the one who likes Mathematics?
options: One
More than three
None
Two
Three

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is not true?
options: P belongs to Punjab and plays Billiards.
T plays Chess and belongs to MP.
The one who belongs to UP plays Football.
The one who is a Wrestler belongs to Tamil Nadu.
All are true.

quiz.text: Who among the following plays Hockey?
options: X
Y
U
V
W

quiz.text: X belongs to which of the following states?
options: Bihar
MP
UP
West Bengal
Tamil Nadu

quiz.text: Which of the following combinations is true?
options: P – Punjab – Cricket
S – Jharkhand – Volleyball
U – Maharashtra – Shooting
X – Bihar – Cricket
W – Odisha – Hockey

quiz.text: Which of the following combinations with regard to P is true?
options: Jharkhand – Volleyball
Haryana – Tennis
Punjab – Billiards
MP – Chess
UP – Football

quiz.text: Who among the following is a doctor and will arrive at Bangalore airport?
options: E
A
C
G
None of these

quiz.text: Who are the two engineers who arrive at Mumbai airport?
options: K and D
K and G
K and B
Can’t be determined
None of these

quiz.text: What is the correct profession – destination combination for E?
options: Doctor – Bangalore
Pilot – Mumbai
Pilot – Kolkata
Doctor – Kolkata
None of these

quiz.text: What is the profession of D?
options: Pilot
Engineer
Doctor
Can’t be determined
None of these

quiz.text: K reaches at which of the following airports?
options: Mumbai
Kolkata
Bangalore
Can’t be determined
None of these
